title: My pixel 3 doesn't turn on or restart or force restart or reset unless it's plugged in. What to do?
content:
My pixel 3 doesn't turn on or restart or force restart or reset unless it's plugged in. What to do?

If it's not plugged in, then,
Switch on - Phone won't turn on.
Connect the charger and switch on, it does.
Restart - Phones shuts down but won't turn on back.
Connect the charger and restart, it works.
Reset - Phone shuts down but it won't turn on and won't reset.
Connect the charger and it starts to reset.

And also the battery is draining badly, thought to restart and fix battery problem and found this problem.
What to do?
